ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: now i am being called an asshole? wtf is yer problem? i will play the game the way i chose!!  I am a cleric and healing is what i do best, so heal I
ygData.messageBody:
now i am being called an asshole? wtf is yer problem? i will play the game
the way i chose!! I am a cleric and healing is what i do best, so heal I
do-everyone and anyone!! And for yer info-The ppl i am talking about are the
ppl that i ask nicely if they want a heal,cuz i usually ask first, and they
are rude to me-instead of saying no thank you they come off with some BS-so
I hook them up!! If you don't like the way i play, by all means ,state yer
opinion, but do not call me an asshole!!!! sheesh
